sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-container fluid>
    <v-row align="center">
      <v-col cols="12" md="6">
        <v-autocomplete
          small-chips
          clearable
          color="grey"
          label="グループを追加"
          item-text="name"
          item-value="id"
          multiple
          :value="value"
          :items="filteredGroups"
          @input="$emit('input', $event)"
        >
        </v-autocomplete>
      </v-col>
    </v-row>
  </v-container>
</template>

<script>
import { mapActions, mapGetters } from 'vuex';

export default {
  name: 'GroupSelectForm',
  props: ['value'],
  computed: {
    ...mapGetters('groups', ['groups']),
    filteredGroups() {
      const excludedGroupNames = ['会議室', '車']; // 除外するグループの名前
      return this.groups.filter(group => !excludedGroupNames.includes(group.name));
    },
  },
};
</script>
